name: @shockpkg/swf-projector
description: Package for creating Flash Player projectors

scripts.clean: rimraf dts esm cjs spec/bundles spec/projectors
scripts.build: npm run build:dts && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.test-legacy: npm run test-legacy:esm && npm run test-legacy:cjs
scripts.test: npm run test:esm && npm run test:cjs
scripts.all-legacy:esm: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run test-legacy:esm && npm run lint && npm run formatted
scripts.all-legacy:cjs: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run test-legacy:cjs && npm run lint && npm run formatted
scripts.all-legacy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test-legacy && npm run lint && npm run formatted
scripts.all:esm: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run test:esm && npm run lint && npm run formatted
scripts.all:cjs: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run test:cjs && npm run lint && npm run formatted
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run formatted
scripts.prepack: npm run launchers && npm run clean && npm run build

author: JrMasterModelBuilder
